name: Salt Lake City

authority.name: Salt Lake City Hearings & Collections
authority.authority_name: Salt Lake City Hearings and Collections (Parking & Civil Citations)
authority.serves_description: Parking and civil citations issued by Salt Lake City within city limits.

citation_pattern.description: Salt Lake City parking citation format
citation_pattern.notes: City citations generally have numeric citation numbers; the ticket will list Salt Lake City as the issuing authority.

appeal_address.missing_reason: Salt Lake City requires appeals to be filed online or in person; no mailing address for appeals is provided【6209850904271†L160-L176】【6209850904271†L195-L199】.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be filed online or by scheduling an in-person hearing; mail appeals are not accepted.

phone_confirmation.department: Salt Lake City Parking & Civil Citations Office
phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm the correct procedure for contesting a parking or civil citation and verify that no mail address is required.

verification.source_note: Salt Lake City website indicates appeals must be filed online or in person; no mailing address given【6209850904271†L160-L176】【6209850904271†L195-L199】.

official_confirmation_department: Salt Lake City Parking & Civil Citations
official_confirmation_purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.
qa_blocking_issues: Several sections (Salt Lake City, University of Utah, SLCC, Westminster University, SLC Airport) lack confirmed mailing addresses for Phase‑1 appeals and require confirmation that online or in‑person procedures are the only options.
qa_known_gaps: Citation number patterns for each authority are assumed with low confidence due to lack of explicit information.
University of Utah and Westminster University sections rely on online-only appeal processes; mailing addresses for first-level appeals are not provided and must be confirmed by phone.
